name: UNTRUST
description:
UNTRUST is a simple narrative-based game... except the world has gone down. Dystopia is on the rise... and a powerful gang is behind a set of murders.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A normal person is staying at a hotel after a much needed rest. But he hears something in the distance? Him deciding to investigate it. Will change him.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Compare each witnesses testimony. Find the outlier. Show the world.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You're the only one here not involved with them. You're the only one who can solve it.
